channel.title: +Articles on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: shishu AngIrasa
item.description: The misinterpretation Some quote: “I am a reciter of hymns, my father is a healer, my mother a grinder of corn. We desire to obtain wealth through various actions”– Rig Veda 9.112.3 Do they have the same Varna? This is an incorrect pramANa. A simple glancing of svAmin sAyaNa’s bhASya and the context of the Rk would explain it. The draSTa is the child RSi - shishu A~Ngirasa as can be seen from the informal way he calls his parents tata and nanA.
